derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French, from Italian mostaccio, from Greek mustax, mustak-

entry.tran: (较长时称作 moustaches)髭，八字胡，八字须
entry.def: A man's moustache is the hair that grows on his upper lip. If it is very long, it is sometimes referred to as his moustaches .
